document_data.mainbody:
The Shadowstruck Passages was a collection of Sharran doctrines compiled within a single tome. It was one of the most notorious and illicit books of the faith and was banned in many of the realms across Faer√ªn.
Possession of the Shadowstruck Passages in Sembia was illegal and punishable by imprisonment for a tenday within the merchant nation. A single copy was worth around 100 gp on the black market.
